Events that occurred on 11 December.

content.title: On Earth
content.content:
1955 - The fifth episode of 1955 radio series of The Fellowship of the Ring airs on the BBC Third Programme.
1971 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes a letter to George and Moira Sayer.
2014 - The Hobbit: The Battle of the Five Armies is released in New Zealand.

content.title: In Arda
content.content:
T.A. 3018:
Frodo and Samwise rest in Rivendell and prepare for their quest to destroy the One Ring.
